entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:29 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 01:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
